topic.title: Welcome to Rainbow Portal
topic.shortdesc: The Rainbow project is an open source initiative to build a comprehensive content management system using Microsoft's ASP.NET and C# technology. Rainbow, available today in 14 languages, allows content authoring to be safely delegated to role-based team members who need little or no knowlege of HTML. Rainbow optionally supports a two-step approval-publish process. 45 plug-in modules are now included in the standard release, including support for an e-store, XML news feeds, Flash, Maps, Newsletter, Surveys, Forums, Document Management, Custom Lists, and more.

section.title: Note:
section.p: The Rainbow Help System is a work-in-progress. In the menu, documents that are planned but not yet present are shown in italic. Note that sub-documents of absent documents may exist.
If you would like to contribute to this resource, either writing original documents or translating existing documents into another language, please contact one of the core development team.
